snippet: Turnout was spectacularly low in the digital republic of Facebook. The company asked user of the social network to vote on privacy polices. Only 0.04 percent of its members bothered, most opposing the new policies. The company announced that it would...
abstract: Turnout was spectacularly low in the digital republic of Facebook. The company asked user of the social network to vote on privacy polices. Only 0.04 percent of its members bothered, most opposing the new policies. The company announced that it would go ahead and adopt the proposals.

headline.main: Facebook Holds a Vote and Turnout Is Low
